column13: Suppliers are expected to adhere to Caresales' Supplier Code of Conduct. It sets out required standards and behaviours for suppliers Ã¢ÂÂ including respect for human rights and avoiding modern slavery in suppliers' supply chains.

column6: Operations that have been subject to human rights reviews or impacts assessments
column13: Carsales' Procurement Framework ensures the integration of modern slavery risk controls into its procurement systems and processes. For example, as part of the Purchase Order process, suppliers are asked to complete Carsales' Supplier Questionnaire and accept its Supplier Code of Conduct.
column20: Procurement Framework, modern slavery risk, procurement system

column6: Employee training on human rights policies or procedures
column13: Carsales acknowledges that to manage its modern slavery risks effectively, it must be proactive in minimising the potential risks within its supply chains and the supply chains of its suppliers. As a result, Carsales created a Modern Slavery Training Booklet in FY22, which is now sent to suppliers that Carsales has identified as 'high-risk'. The initial feedback from suppliers regarding the Modern Slavery Training Booklet has been extremely positive.
column20: Modern Slavery Training Booklet, modern slavery risk, supplier

column6: Significant investment agreements and contracts that include human rights clauses or that underwent human rights screening
column13: Carsales continued to screen new suppliers for modern slavery risks and sought to insert anti-slavery clauses in its supplier contracts. Carsales also requested that suppliers commit to its Supplier Code of Conduct and work with its suppliers collaboratively to address modern slavery risks.
column20: Screening, anti-slavery clause, modern slavery risk

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: This year, Carsales' Australian business is proud to publish its first Reflect Reconciliation Action Plan (RAP), endorsed by Reconciliation Australia. Carsales' vision for reconciliation is overcoming the divide and racial inequality between First Nations Australians and other Australians.
column20: Reconciliation Action Plan, Reconciliation Australia, First Nations

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: Carsales' RAP has a custom artwork titled 'Travelling on Country.' The artwork was created by Riki Salam from We Are 27 Creative. Riki was born and raised in Cairns on Yidinji Land. He now lives in Turrbul & Yaggera Country in Meanjin, Brisbane and is connected to the Torres Strait and Yalanji Country on his father's side and Ngai Tahu, South Island of New Zealand, on his mother's side.
column20: Travelling on Country, custom artwork, Riki Salam

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: This year, the Carsales team celebrated National Reconciliation Week and NAIDOC Week, attending internal and external events and bringing First Nations guest speakers into the business to share their stories and experiences. The Carsales RAP Working Group (RWG) meets bimonthly to discuss the implementation of RAP-related initiatives and explore how Carsales can continue to build meaningful relationships with First Nations communities.

It represents an opportunity to showcase the future of technology and challenge misconceptions about what a career in IT might look like.

column6: Substantiated complaints concerning breaches of customer privacy and losses of customer data
column13: Carsales works closely with its industry partners, collaborating on exploring emerging technologies and how it can utilise these technologies to enhance its business. The AWS Deep Racer series is one example where the Carsales team explored Machine Learning (ML) using Reinforcement Learning (RL). RL is an advanced ML technique that takes a different approach to training models than other ML methods. It learns complex behaviours without requiring any labelled training data and can make short-term decisions while optimising for a longer-term goal.
column20: AWS Deep Racer, emerging technology, Machine Learning
